CustomField.description: Handlers are run in ascending order of this field for a given sObject and Event. If order is unimportant, you can just use 0.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Handlers are run in ascending order of this field for a given sObject and Event Handlers are run in ascending order of this field for a given sObject and Event. If order is unimportant, you can just use 0.
CustomField.label: Order
